title: Would you play this champ and how would you build them?
body:
Fury champion:
This champ only has 1 ability
Q: dashes to the target. if it's an enemy deals 100/103/108/117/128/140/158/180/206/234/270/300/332/368/400/450/500/600 + 150% AD physical damage and gains 5 fury per dash. This dash can crit. The range of the dash is 700 + 3x fury
Cooldown: 1s

Passive: the cooldown of all this champ's abilities (Q) is lowered by fury/100 seconds. Upon reaching 100 fury, he can have 2 dashes without cooldown and then returns to 0 fury
